name: Fine Clothing Shop
description: An upscale boutique selling elegant and expensive garments; adventurers can purchase formal attire, commission luxury clothing, or mingle with the wealthy elite.
atmosphere: The boutique has an air of refined elegance with the soft scent of fine fabrics and expensive perfumes. The sound of quiet conversation and the rustle of luxurious materials creates a sophisticated, upscale atmosphere. The space feels exclusive and refined, a sanctuary of style and wealth.
